mapper.select: select t.id,t.order_id,t.good_id,t.quantity,t.create_time, t2.sku,t2.hs_code,t2.name_cn,t2.declared_value,t2.declared_currency, t6.unit_price, t6.cid, t6.unit, t6.status, t6.remark, t6.service_name, t6.customer_name from order_shop t JOIN order_info t1 on t1.id = t.order_id JOIN customer_goods t2 on t2.id = t.good_id join offer_info t3 on t3.id = t1.offer_info_id join quotation_template t4 on t4.id = t3.qie join service_group t5 on t5.id = t4.sid join goods_service_cost t6 on t6.service_id = t5.id and t6.good_id = t.good_id WHERE t1.id = #{orderId} ORDER BY t.id;
